item.title: Cloud Native
item.description: Built on proven DevOps concepts like immutable infrastructure, declarative configuration, and microservice architecture, CloudNativePG exclusively relies on the Kubernetes API server to maintain the state of a PostgreSQL cluster and provides cloud native capabilities like self-healing, high availability, rolling updates, scale up/down of read-only replicas, affinity/anti-affinity/tolerations for scheduling, resource management, and so on.
